text: Brazzeia is a genus of plants in the family Lecythidaceae. It contains the following accepted species, according to 'The Plant List' : * Brazzeia congoensis Baill. * Brazzeia longipedicellata Verdc. * Brazzeia soyauxii (Oliv.) Tiegh. ==References== Category:Lecythidaceae Category:Ericales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Henri Ernest Baillon
title: Brazzeia
